Honours Project

Final year project

In my final year of university I was required to complete an Honours project of my own design. I devised a topic for the project that was in line with my interests and passions: web-design and development, e-learning, and new technologies. The title of the report was: “Investigating and understanding the challenges associated with developing immersive virtual reality e-learning experiences for the web, and a variety of VR device types.”
